mapper.insert: /* user.contents.addContentsFavorite */ INSERT INTO covi_smart4j.sys_favorite ( TargetServiceType, TargetObjectType, TargetID, TargetURL, UserCode ) VALUES ( 'ContentsApp', #{ftype}, #{fid}, '', #{USERID} )

INSERT INTO board_chart(ChartName, FolderID, ChartType, ChartCol, ChartMethod, ChartSubCol, RegisterCode, RegistDate) VALUES(#{chartName}, #{folderID}, #{chartType}, #{chartCol}, #{chartMethod}, #{chartSubCol}, #{USERID}, now() )
mapper.select:
with cte AS ( SELECT bm.MessageID
,bu.IsOption IsOption ,'N' IsOption
,(SELECT buvs.FieldValue FROM board_userform_value buvs where bm.MessageID = buvs.MessageID AND buvs.UserFormID = #{chartSubCol}) GroupVal
,0 GroupVal
,ifnull(bm.CreatorCode,'') GroupCode
,date_format(bm.CreateDate ,'%Y-%m') GroupCode
,ifnull(buv.FieldValue,'') GroupCode
FROM board_message bm
LEFT JOIN board_userform bu ON bm.folderid = bu.folderid AND bu.UserFormID = #{chartColID} LEFT JOIN board_userform_value buv ON bm.MessageID = buv.MessageID AND bu.UserFormID = buv.UserFormID LEFT JOIN board_userform_option buo ON buv.UserFormID = buo.UserFormID AND buv.FieldValue = buo.OptionValue
LEFT JOIN board_userform sbu ON bm.folderid = sbu.folderid AND sbu.UserFormID = #{userFormID} LEFT JOIN board_userform_value sbuv ON bm.MessageID = sbuv.MessageID AND sbu.UserFormID = sbuv.UserFormID AND (sbu.IsOption = 'Y' OR (sbu.IsOption = 'N' and sbuv.FieldValue LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%'))) LEFT JOIN board_userform_option sbuo ON sbuv.UserFormID = sbuo.UserFormID and bm.folderid = sbuo.folderid AND (sbu.IsOption = 'N' OR (sbu.IsOption = 'Y' and sbuo.OptionName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') AND sbuv.FieldValue LIKE CONCAT('%',sbuo.OptionValue ,'%')))
WHERE bm.folderid = #{folderID} AND BM.DeleteDate IS NULL AND BM.MsgState IN ('C', 'A') AND BM.MsgType != 'S'
AND ( BM.Subject LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') || BM.BodyText LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') )
AND ( ( sbu.IsOption = 'N' AND sbuv.MessageID IS NOT NULL) OR ( sbu.IsOption = 'Y' AND sbuo.UserFormID IS NOT NULL))
AND ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(Tag SEPARATOR ',') FROM board_message_tag WHERE MessageID = BM.MessageID AND Version = BM.Version ) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
AND BM.BodyText LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') AND BM.CreatorName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') AND BM.Number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') AND BM.Subject LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
AND BM.RegistDate between #{startDate} and #{endDate} ) SELECT GroupCode
,(SELECT Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, MultiDisplayName) FROM sys_object_user WHERE UserCode = A.GroupCode) AS GroupName
, GroupCode GroupName
, case when IsOption = 'N' then GroupCode ELSE (SELECT Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S('ko', OptionName) FROM board_userform_option buo WHERE buo.UserFormID = #{chartColID} AND buo.OptionValue = GroupCode) end GroupName
, COUNT(1) GroupVal
, ifnull(SUM(GroupVal),0) GroupVal
, ifnull(AVG(GroupVal),0) GroupVal
FROM ( SELECT cte.MessageID, SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(cte.GroupCode, ';', numbers.n), ';', -1) GroupCode , GroupVal , IsOption FROM (SELECT 1 n UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL select 5) numbers INNER JOIN cte on CHAR_LENGTH(cte.GroupCode) -CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(cte.GroupCode, ';', ''))>=numbers.n-1 ) A GROUP BY ifnull(GroupCode,'')

/* user.contents.selectContentsFolderMenu */ SELECT A.MenuID AS no , A.DisplayName AS nodeName , A.MemberOf AS pno , A.SortPath , A.DomainID , 'N' AS IsAdmin FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_folder A LEFT join covi_smart4j.sys_object_folder B on B.menuid = A.MemberOf WHERE A.DomainID = #{domainID} AND A.ObjectType = #{bizSection} AND A.FolderType IN ('Root','Folder') AND (A.MemberOf =0 OR B.MenuID IS NOT NULL) AND A.IsUse = 'Y' AND A.DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY A.SortPath

/* user.contents.selectTargetFolder */ SELECT MemberOf , SortKey , FolderPath , SortPath , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_folder WHERE MemberOf = #{folderID}) AS TargetSortKey FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_folder A WHERE FolderID = #{folderID}
/* user.contents.selectUserFormImageData */ SELECT UserFormID , GotoLink FROM covi_smart4j.board_userform WHERE UserFormID = #{userFormID} AND FieldType = 'Image' AND DeleteDate IS null

/* user.contents.selectUserDefFormGridList */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BU.UserFormID , BU.FolderID , BU.SortKey , BU.FieldType , BU.FieldSize , BU.FieldLimitCnt , BU.FieldAlign , BU.IsList , BU.IsOption , IFNULL(BU.IsCheckVal, 'N') AS IsCheckVal , BU.IsSearchItem , BU.FieldName , Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, FieldName) AS DisplayName , BU.IsLabel , BU.Description , BU.IsTooltip , BU.IsDup , BU.DefVal , BU.FieldLimitMin , BU.FieldLimitMax , BU.FieldWidth , BU.FieldWidthUnit , BU.FieldHeight , BU.FieldHeightUnit , BU.FieldRow , BU.GotoLink , BU.IsTitle , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_userform_option WHERE UserFormID=BU.UserFormID AND FolderID=#{folderID} ) AS OptionCnt , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(bup.OptionID,'^', bup.OptionName,'^',bup.OptionValue,'^',bup.OptionCheck ) SEPARATOR '|') FROM board_userform_option bup WHERE UserFormID=BU.UserFormID AND FolderID=#{folderID} ORDER BY bup.SortKey ) AS OptionList FROM board_userform AS BU WHERE 1=1 AND BU.FolderID=#{folderID} AND BU.DeleteDate IS NULL ) AS RESULT ORDER BY SortKey ASC

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID();

/* user.contents.insertBoardConfig */ INSERT INTO board_config ( FolderID ,UseBasicConfig ,UseFile ,UseImage ,UseVideo ,UsePopNotice ,UseTopNotice ,UseExpiredDate ,UseAnony ,UseReply ,UseComment ,UseInterest ,UseFavorite ,UseRecommend ,UseSecret ,UseTag ,UseLink ,UsePrint ,LimitFileSize ,LimitFileCnt ,LimitCommentCnt ,LimitLinkCnt ,RecentlyDay ,ExpireDay ,DefaultContents ,UseScrap ,UseCopy ,UseCommentRecommend ,UseLogWrite ,UseReadCnt ,UseTrackback ,UseRSS ,UseReaderView ,UseDefaultSecret ,UseEmail ,UseCategory ,UseBodyForm ,UseUserForm ,UseOwnerProcess ,UseUserProcess ,RegisterCode ,RegistDate ,BoardTotalLimitFileSize ,CurrentTotalFileSize ,UseReservation ,UsePubDeptName ,UseIcon ) SELECT #{folderID} ,UseBasicConfig ,UseFile ,UseImage ,UseVideo ,UsePopNotice ,UseTopNotice ,UseExpiredDate ,UseAnony ,UseReply ,UseComment ,UseInterest ,UseFavorite ,UseRecommend ,UseSecret ,UseTag ,UseLink ,UsePrint ,LimitFileSize ,LimitFileCnt ,LimitCommentCnt ,LimitLinkCnt ,RecentlyDay ,ExpireDay ,DefaultContents ,UseScrap ,UseCopy ,UseCommentRecommend ,UseLogWrite ,UseReadCnt ,UseTrackback ,UseRSS ,UseReaderView ,UseDefaultSecret ,UseEmail ,UseCategory ,UseBodyForm ,UseUserForm ,UseOwnerProcess ,UseUserProcess ,RegisterCode ,RegistDate ,BoardTotalLimitFileSize ,CurrentTotalFileSize ,UseReservation ,UsePubDeptName ,#{useIcon} UseIcon FROM board_config WHERE FolderID = #{pFolderID}
